verses.verse: Now Moses <WH4872> went <WH5927> up from the plains <WH6160> of Moab <WH4124> to Mount <WH2022> Nebo, <WH5015> to the top <WH7218> of Pisgah, <WH6449> which <WH834> is opposite <WH5921> <WH6440> Jericho. <WH3405> And the Lord <WH3068> showed <WH7200> him all <WH3605> the land, <WH776> Gilead <WH1568> as far <WH5704> as Dan, <WH1835>

and all <WH3605> Naphtali <WH5321> and the land <WH776> of Ephraim <WH669> and Manasseh, <WH4519> and all <WH3605> the land <WH776> of Judah <WH3063> as far <WH5704> as the western <WH314> sea, <WH3220>
and the Negev <WH5045> and the plain <WH3603> in the valley <WH1237> of Jericho, <WH3405> the city <WH5892> of palm <WH8558> trees, <WH8558> as far <WH5704> as Zoar. <WH6820>

Then the Lord <WH3068> said <WH559> to him, "This <WH2088> is the land <WH776> which <WH834> I swore <WH7650> to Abraham, <WH85> Isaac, <WH3327> and Jacob, <WH3290> saying, <WH559> 'I will give <WH5414> it to your descendants <WH2233>'; I have let you see <WH7200> [it] with your eyes, <WH5869> but you shall not go <WH5674> over <WH5674> there. <WH8033>"
So Moses <WH4872> the servant <WH5650> of the Lord <WH3068> died <WH4191> there <WH8033> in the land <WH776> of Moab, <WH4124> according <WH5921> to the word <WH6310> of the Lord. <WH3068>

And He buried <WH6912> him in the valley <WH1516> in the land <WH776> of Moab, <WH4124> opposite <WH4136> Beth-peor; but no <WH3808> man <WH376> knows <WH3045> his burial <WH6900> place <WH6900> to this <WH2088> day. <WH3117>

Although Moses <WH4872> was one hundred <WH3967> and twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> when he died, <WH4194> his eye <WH5869> was not dim, <WH3543> nor <WH3808> his vigor <WH3893> abated. <WH5127>

So the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> wept <WH1058> for Moses <WH4872> in the plains <WH6160> of Moab <WH4124> thirty <WH7970> days; <WH3117> then the days <WH3117> of weeping <WH1065> [and] mourning <WH60> for Moses <WH4872> came <WH8552> to an end. <WH8552>

Now Joshua <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126> was filled <WH4392> with the spirit <WH7307> of wisdom, <WH2451> for Moses <WH4872> had laid <WH5564> his hands <WH3027> on him; and the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> listened <WH8085> to him and did <WH6213> as the Lord <WH3068> had commanded <WH6680> Moses. <WH4872>
Since <WH5750> then <WH5750> no <WH3808> prophet <WH5030> has risen <WH6965> in Israel <WH3478> like Moses, <WH4872> whom <WH834> the Lord <WH3068> knew <WH3045> face <WH6440> to face, <WH6440>

for all <WH3605> the signs <WH226> and wonders <WH4159> which <WH834> the Lord <WH3068> sent <WH7971> him to perform <WH6213> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> against Pharaoh, <WH6547> all <WH3605> his servants, <WH5650> and all <WH3605> his land, <WH776>

and for all <WH3605> the mighty <WH2389> power <WH3027> and for all <WH3605> the great <WH1419> terror <WH4172> which <WH834> Moses <WH4872> performed <WH6213> in the sight <WH5869> of all <WH3605> Israel. <WH3478>
